titles.title: Authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee to notify the President of the assembly of the Congress.
Authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee to notify the President of the assembly of the Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Provides for appointment of a House of Representatives committee joined with a Senate committee to notify the President that a quorum of each House has assembled.
